Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Oem.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

HeaterMetrics.description: The HeaterMetrics schema contains definitions for the metrics of a heater.
HeaterMetrics.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent the metrics of a heater unit for a Redfish implementation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Actions.description: The available actions for this resource.
Actions.longDescription: This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.

Oem.longDescription: This property shall contain the OEM extensions.  All values for properties that this object contains shall conform to the Redfish Specification-described requirements.

PowerWatts.longDescription: This property shall contain the total power consumption, in watt units, for this resource.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Power`.

PrePowerOnHeatingTimeSeconds.description: The total number of seconds the heater was active while the device it heats was powered off.
PrePowerOnHeatingTimeSeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of seconds the heater was active while the device it heats was powered off.

RuntimeHeatingTimeSeconds.description: The total number of seconds the heater was active while the device it heats was powered on.
RuntimeHeatingTimeSeconds.longDescription: This property shall contain the total number of seconds the heater was active while the device it heats was powered on.

TemperatureReadingsCelsius.description: The temperatures (Celsius) from all related sensors for this device.
TemperatureReadingsCelsius.longDescription: This property shall contain the temperatures, in degrees Celsius units, for this subsystem.  The value of the DataSourceUri property, if present, shall reference a resource of type Sensor with the ReadingType property containing the value `Temperature`.

OemActions.description: The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
OemActions.longDescription: This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

ResetMetrics.description: This action resets the summary metrics related to this equipment.
ResetMetrics.longDescription: This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this equipment.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

title: #HeaterMetrics.v1_0_0.HeaterMetrics
